content: terrible attitude towards customers on their forums, aggressive wording everywhere. this isn't a free app, you are not doing me a favor.

The app works good but I uninstalled it because their support is non-responsive. I've emailed their support several days ago and also posted to their support forum asking for help on a problem I'm having and they have done nothing, no response.
does no working , tried on emby and trakt

Tried the lite version before purchasing but it seems I didn't test it carefully. I'm trying to have Multiple profiles with Jellyfin client but as soon as I sign in to the second profile, the first profile seems to signed out (empty library) If I try to re-sign in on first profile, 2nd profile will sign out. This works perfectly on libreelec so it seems you're using a different way to connect to jellyfin? Can I refund if this will not be fixed?
No work
Crashed or stops everytime start it
Kodi hates android and MrMC loves it! I can finally enjoy audio/video on my android box.

It's a watered-down Kodi but I knew that when I purchased it. What I hate is that they removed the Confluence skin. I had Mr.MC set up for my kids and the new UI they are forced to use isn't as easy. I asked dev to add it back but was ignored. 1* for poor CS.
App does not work. Audio does not pass though correctly. It is a poor fork of free Kodi software. Wont give refund. Avoid
Yes. I know this is a fork of Kodi. However this is the strip down version so it should be faster than Kodi. Loved it and I use it on my phone now.

Very good Kodi replacement that works surprisingly quick and all tested movies were played without glitches. I am using it instead of SPMC that has been abandoned. The only issue is that - by design - cut down a possibility to apply addons. It would NOT be a problem if TITAN skin could be available, and so far it is the best skin for Android TV for me, but it is not included. Pity. With Titan skin I would add 5 stars. Please add it to the next release. :) PS: Also it would be nice to have one or two additional subtitles addons... BTW Where I could report minor bugs and issues?

Solved all my transcoding problems that Plex couldn't. My videos direct play with no transcoding straight from my Plex server and I couldn't be happier. Plex is more focused on building out streaming content deals and no longer gives any effort towards pleasing the actual consumers of their platform. Thank you, MrMc

Really slow navigation on full version with formuler android box. Takes about a minute to load al my movies. Am using an external emby source. Demo version was fast but ful version sems slow as a snail. Sad because the playback and audio and subtitles are working amazing during the playback compared to the native emby app.
Notification bar not hiding during playback. Android 9.0 AEX rom
I'm very disappointed in paying for a fork of kodi which is free that doesn't work properly. I can't connect it to my emby media server regardless of what i try. waste of money.
No audio when passthrough is enabled in mibox 3. With kodi it works good.

I loved this... until the latest update on my nVidia Shield.  I don't want the movie posters, just the file browser.  But it only uses the right 40% of the screen to show the file structure - so most file names are cut off and the entire left side is white space!  And I checked - there is no option to use the full screen or old interface.  User interface should not get worse... or at least give me the option to use the old interface.  Secondly, some of my ripped DVDs no longer play - the video stutters. I had to go back to my old Dune HD to play the videos which are only 2GB (not like I was trying huge BluRay rips).  That ancient Dune box can play the .mkv files, and MrMC *used* to be able to play them, but no longer.  Oh, and my phone can stream the .mkvs no problem using a different app.  So it is definitely the MrMC.  So let's review:  user interface since the update is horrible, and some files no longer play.  I am looking at other options and will uninstall for sure.  Buyer beware.

Great app. It is the first app that does audio passthrough correctly. Others say they do but they don't work as well as MrMC . This app will play/stream anything. Make the purchase, extra features well worth it. I promise you won't use any other video/audio player ever again. If i could give a 10 üåü rating I would have.
very disappointed I've wasted my money

bug in tv shows...pressing back button takes you to home view instead of all tv shows....pressing on tv shows again takes you to the same tv show folder...mrmc stuck in one tv show folder have to quit mrmc to be able to get back to all tv shows...video play back sucks all videos judders/stumbles...not a smooth play back...switching back to kodi...waste of money
Latest update has cause jerky playback on Nvidia Shield from Plex server. Really like the new UI. Fix the playback issues and would be 5 stars.

The update to MrMC 3.8 appears to have fixed an audio issue I have been having with the Mi Box S. I have owned the Mi Box S since Thanksgiving 2018 and have had all content with multichannel AAC or Dolby Digital + audio playing to an older receiver through optical via passthrough be unlistenable with distorted choppy sound. When passthrough was disabled it would play fine in stereo. As of the 3.8 update, the multichannel audio plays via optical passthrough quite well. Very pleased. Side notes: the FireTV 1 box played the same content over optical passthrough fine using 3.7.1. The Mi Box S has not had an update in months so I am assuming it was the MrMC update that provided the audio fix. I miss the default UI from the older MrMC.
Since the recent update streaming from my plex server has started to be jerky. Never had issues on previous build. Looks like other users having issue. This is on the shield.

Has had a recent update that makes it unusable with Nvidia Shield - was a great app - now it is just a complete waste of money - can no longer switch frames - basically every video is a juddering, out of sync mess

Outstanding! It‚Äôs truly the best! It can play our Dolby Atmos Demo files from Dolby with full atmos passthrough. Excellent interface and plays everything wonderfully. One note, passthrough didn‚Äôt work properly for me with the prechecked ‚Äúpassthrough format is IEC Packed‚Äù. Unchecked, it works perfectly every time.  A must have app on the Nvidia Shield! Bravo amazing developers!!!

Plex/emby service is acting up lately a lot in androidtv. for example, I select a movie from a Plex server, click on "play" button then i see the loading screen and bam back to movies page. please fix.

Navigation is not intuitive. subtitles require more steps than necessary and never sync correctly. Menus just can't be organized in a way that makes it easy to find my new downloads. Will be going back to Kodi 16.
Would get a higher rating if it had better subtitle options, the font  selection being my point. Please add a font that can support not Western languages such as Thai.
Kodi is still better. Audio pass thru for Nvidia shield is broken. Can't believe I paid for this. #robbed
Developers don't specify clearly that this is not compatible with user installed add one. Rip off. Stay away.

Complete rip off. It's a reskin of the kodi plex plugin that barely works. They even recently deleted the plex plugin to make it look like "their thing". Also moved settings around to make it look original. Complete waste of money.
I'm using the shield controller, and for some reason it does not work at all only inside MrMC. It seems to not work randomly for weeks on end, and then it does.
Faster then Kodi and deinterlaces better too. Resolution and framers auto switching now works on Shield TV.
Since 3.7 update, emby integration stopped working. Was working the night before fine as I watched a movie. EmbyCon still in kodi. Very disappointed because I bought the app judt for that.
Best media player for the Nvidia Shield TV, despite some flaws.

Amazing media player! Played everything perfectly smooth. Auto frame rate 
switching, auto resolution switching and full True HD passthrough. Can't 
wait for the next release. Hoping for Oreo features such as channel support 
and a more modern but still simple UI. Keep it up!!
Seems like a great app when it works. Unfortunately, I purchased it only to find it doesn't work on half my devices because of an unlocked boot loader (not even rooted).

Lovely frontend application for Shield TV. Well worth the entry price. Has 
the Plex add-on which works really well. Responsive Devs and a great forum

Fantastic! Flies on my Shield. Any plans to support the android 8.0 UI so 
MrMC shows as a featured app?

Was a bit sceptical of this.. saw it as paying for Kodi. Which to be fair. 
I am glad I did but it,so many extra little tweaks and finally have 4k 
playback on my Razer phone from my tvheadend server. Great piece of work 
and ¬£2.99 well spent.
Works perfectly on my Shield and Pixel C.
